articles.author: Gregg Keizer
articles.title: Microsoft releases new perpetual Office for enterprise - Channel Asia Singapore
articles.description: The new Office suite, dubbed "Office LTSC 2021," is basically a subset of the feature catalog of Office 365 (and its more expansive sibling, Microsoft 365) that will remain unchanged until its support ends.
articles.content:
Microsoft last week announced the availability of the next edition of perpetual-license Office for commercial and government customers.
Dubbed "Office LTSC 2021," as in "Long-term Support Channel," … [+3002 chars]

articles.title: ‘Not a defence alliance’: Australia looks to assuage Asean’s concerns over Aukus - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Canberra’s envoy to the Southeast Asian bloc says the arrangement will not change Australia’s commitment to Asean-led regional infrastructure.

articles.title: Asian shares at 1-month low, default fears stalk China Evergrande - The Star Online
articles.description: BENGALURU: Asian shares skidded and the dollar firmed on Monday ahead of a week packed with global central bank meetings, with a torrid session for the world's most indebted property developer China Evergrande dragging Hong Kong stocks to a near one-year low.
